list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command" WITH KEY = "service"
list.label: Service
list.name: service_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command" WITH KEY = "service"

list.label: Host
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command"  WITH KEY = "hostname" WHERE service =~ /$service_name/

list.label: Metrics
list.name: Metrics
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command"  WITH KEY = "metric"  WHERE service =~ /$service_name/ AND hostname =~ /$hostname/

title: Service: Diskspace Windows
